entries.femaleVariant: Hey, you! Yeah, you! Who you gonna vote for? Devolutionists or Federalists?
S'OK, don't answer that. It doesn't matter. Your votes are useless, anyway.
Both parties are pitchin' you the same ol' bullshit – cancer capitalism, a libertarian dystopia, a world without values, hope, basic empathy...
All they want's for you is to slave away till you drop dead. To be a cog in the machine till you forget you're even human.
They all say the same thing – that you, too, can be rich. That if you just work hard enough and take care of yourself, you'll make it to the top.

Lies, lies and MORE lies. The American dream is dead! We're living in the American nightmare – a nightmare where you don't wake up! Behold! Poverty in every flavor of the rainbow, two-for-one discount on death!
My dear Night Citizens, it's time you stopped eating their lies. Time you knew there was another way.
The system cannot be changed. Only abolished – once and for all.
